body:
Dear All,


As you can see, I recently cleared a bunch of e-mails that had been backed up in the radinace-dev list since October(!)  (Apologies for the last one -- I passed it by mistake based on the subject.)  I was only recently made moderator of this list, so I had no idea it was backed up until this morning.  I just thought it was quiet...


I shall respond to a few of the messages that are still relevant.  If any of you would like to rescind your question(s), or had them answered elsewhere, let me know.


Cheers,
-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-dev/2017-July/001703.html).</sup>
